title: Asian Shares Rise After US Gains, China To Re-Open: Markets Wrap
description: Asian shares rose after a renewed wave of buying in companies linked to the artificial-intelligence boom sent Wall Street benchmarks to new peaks. Gold and oil edged lower on a peace deal in the Middle East. MSCI’s regional stock gauge rose 0.3% with tech firms such as Softbank Group Corp. among the winners. An index of US-listed Chinese stocks gained 0.9% as investors prepared for the reopening of mainland Chinese markets after the Golden Week break.
